sentences.sCn: 马尔科姆是个精明的商人。

sentences.sContent: She was shrewd enough to guess who was responsible.
sentences.sCn: 她很精明，一猜就知道是谁干的。

sentences.sContent: Capra looked at her with shrewd eyes.
sentences.sCn: 卡普拉眼神犀利地看着她。

remMethod.val: “熟的” → 对某事很熟， 因此反应灵敏 → 机灵的

words.tran: 精明干练地；机灵地；刁钻地

trans.tranOther: good at judging what people or situations are really like
